intro: Dolichogyne glabra, commonly known as the smooth spiderwort, is a flowering plant native to parts of Africa and Asia. It is a member of the family Commelinaceae and is characterized by its slender, erect stems and small, white or pale blue flowers. Dolichogyne glabra is known for its ability to thrive in humid conditions and is often found in tropical and subtropical regions.
